app.name: Swim RAG
app.slogan: AI-powered training plan generator for swimmers and triathletes.
app.hero_description: Generate personalized training plans for swimmers, triathletes, and coaches. Just describe what you're looking for, and our AI will create a custom plan for you.

footer.copyright: © 2025 Swim RAG. Built with Vue.js and TypeScript.

form.describe_training_needs_tooltip: Be specific about your goals, experience level, time constraints, and preferences.
form.example_placeholder: Example: I need a 45-minute freestyle endurance workout for an intermediate swimmer...
form.swimming_strokes_tooltip: Select specific swimming strokes to focus on
form.difficulty_level_tooltip: Filter plans by swimmer experience level
form.training_type_tooltip: Filter plans by training focus and goals
form.request_too_long: Your request is too long! Please limit it to 3000 characters.
form.failed_to_generate_prompt_with_error: Failed to generate prompt with error:

display.amount_tooltip: Number of repetitions for the exercise.
display.distance_tooltip: Distance in meters for each repetition.
display.break_tooltip: Rest period between repetitions or sets.

content_tooltip.title: Common abbreviations for swimming strokes and techniques:
content_tooltip.freestyle: K, Kr, Freistil, F, Fr: Kraulschwimmen (Freestyle)

display.total_tooltip: Total distance in meters for the exercise set.
display.no_plan_yet: No training plan generated yet. Use the form above to create one!

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Swim Gen ("we," "our," or "us") handles your personal information when you use our AI-powered training plan generator. We are committed to protecting your privacy and have designed our application with privacy-by-design principles.
privacy_policy.privacy_by_design: Swim Gen is designed to protect your privacy from the ground up. Currently, our application operates anonymously and does not collect, store, or process any personal data. You can use our service without creating an account, providing personal information, or being tracked.
privacy_policy.info_we_collect: Personal Data: None. We do not collect names, email addresses, or any personally identifiable information. Account Data: None. No user accounts or authentication is required. Training Data: Your training plan requests and generated plans are processed temporarily to provide the service but are not stored or associated with you personally.
privacy_policy.technical_info: To provide our service, we may temporarily process: Training Requests: The text you submit to generate training plans (processed and discarded). Session Data: Temporary browser session information required for functionality. Server Logs: Basic technical logs for system maintenance (no personal identification). This technical data is not linked to your identity and cannot be used to identify you personally.
privacy_policy.cookies: No Tracking: We do not use tracking cookies, analytics cookies, or marketing cookies. Essential Cookies Only: We may use strictly necessary technical cookies for basic functionality (such as maintaining your session), but these do not track or identify you.
privacy_policy.future_data_donation: In future versions, we may offer an optional data donation feature to help improve our application. This will be: Completely voluntary - Opt-in only, never enabled by default. Transparent - Clear explanation of what data would be shared. Revocable - You can withdraw consent at any time. Anonymized - Data will be anonymized before being used for improvements. Until such a feature is implemented, no data donation occurs.
privacy_policy.third_party: Backend API: We use our own backend service to process training plan generation. This service operates under the same privacy-by-design principles. No External Analytics: We do not use Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, or similar tracking services. No Social Media Integration: We do not integrate with social media platforms that could track you.
privacy_policy.gdpr_rights: Even though we collect minimal data, you have the following rights: Right to Access: Request information about any personal data we hold. Right to Rectification: Correct any inaccurate personal data. Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data. Right to Restriction: Limit how your personal data is processed. Right to Data Portability: Receive your personal data in a portable format. Right to Object: Object to processing of your personal data. Right to Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent for any future data processing. Since we currently collect no personal data, most of these rights are not applicable, but they will apply if you choose to use future optional features.
privacy_policy.data_security: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect any data we process: Encryption: All data transmission is encrypted using HTTPS. No Data Storage: Personal data is not stored, eliminating most security risks. Secure Infrastructure: Our systems follow security best practices. Regular Updates: We keep our systems updated with security patches.
privacy_policy.intl_data_transfers: Since we do not collect personal data, there are currently no international data transfers of personal information. If this changes in the future, we will ensure appropriate safeguards are in place and update this policy accordingly. Data is processed within the European Union (EU) to comply with GDPR requirements.
privacy_policy.children: Our service is not specifically directed at children under 16. Since we do not collect personal data, we do not knowingly collect information from children.
privacy_policy.changes: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or for legal compliance. When we make changes: We will update the 'Last Updated' date at the top of this policy. Significant changes will be prominently displayed in the application. For major changes affecting your rights, we may provide additional notice. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your privacy.
privacy_policy.contact: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us: Email: privacy@swim-rag.com. GitHub: https://github.com/5pirit5eal/swim-rag. Data Protection Inquiries: For specific data protection questions or to exercise your rights under GDPR, please use the email address above with the subject line 'Data Protection Inquiry.'
privacy_policy.commitment: Swim Gen is committed to being a privacy-respecting application. We believe that powerful AI tools for swimmers and triathletes can be provided without compromising your privacy. Our goal is to prove that useful applications can operate with minimal data collection while still providing excellent user experiences.

terms_of_service.title: Terms and Conditions of Swim Gen
terms_of_service.intro: These Terms govern the use of this Application, and, any other related Agreement or legal relationship with the Owner in a legally binding way. Capitalized words are defined in the relevant dedicated section of this document.
terms_of_service.read_carefully: The User must read this document carefully.
terms_of_service.at_a_glance_title: What the User should know at a glance
terms_of_service.at_a_glance: Please note that some provisions in these Terms may only apply to certain categories of Users. In particular, certain provisions may only apply to Consumers or to those Users that do not qualify as Consumers. Such limitations are always explicitly mentioned within each affected clause. In the absence of any such mention, clauses apply to all Users.
terms_of_service.terms_of_use: Unless otherwise specified, the terms of use detailed in this section apply generally when using this Application.
terms_of_service.additional_conditions: Single or additional conditions of use or access may apply in specific scenarios and in such cases are additionally indicated within this document.
terms_of_service.requirements: By using this Application, Users confirm to meet the following requirements:
requirements_list: There are no restrictions for Users in terms of being Consumers or Business Users;
terms_of_service.content: Unless where otherwise specified or clearly recognizable, all content available on this Application is owned or provided by the Owner or its licensors.
terms_of_service.content_effort: The Owner undertakes its utmost effort to ensure that the content provided on this Application infringes no applicable legal provisions or third-party rights. However, it may not always be possible to achieve such a result. In such cases, without prejudice to any legal prerogatives of Users to enforce their rights, Users are kindly asked to preferably report related complaints using the contact details provided in this document.
terms_of_service.rights_title: Rights regarding content on this Application - All rights reserved
terms_of_service.rights: The Owner holds and reserves all intellectual property rights for any such content.
terms_of_service.rights_usage: Users may not therefore use such content in any way that is not necessary or implicit in the proper use of the Service.
terms_of_service.rights_prohibited: In particular, but without limitation, Users may not copy, download, share (beyond the limits set forth below), modify, translate, transform, publish, transmit, sell, sublicense, edit, transfer/assign to third parties or create derivative works from the content available on this Application, nor allow any third party to do so through the User or their device, even without the User's knowledge.
terms_of_service.rights_personal_use: Where explicitly stated on this Application, the User may download, copy and/or share some content available through this Application for its sole personal and non-commercial use and provided that the copyright attributions and all the other attributions requested by the Owner are correctly implemented.
terms_of_service.rights_limitation: Any applicable statutory limitation or exception to copyright shall stay unaffected.
terms_of_service.user_content: The Owner allows Users to provide content to this Application, primarily for the purpose of donating training plans to improve the service.
terms_of_service.user_content_confirm: By providing content to this Application, Users confirm that they are legally allowed to do so and that they are not infringing any statutory provisions and/or third-party rights.
terms_of_service.external_resources: Through this Application Users may have access to external resources provided by third parties. Users acknowledge and accept that the Owner has no control over such resources and is therefore not responsible for their content and availability.
terms_of_service.external_resources_conditions: Conditions applicable to any resources provided by third parties, including those applicable to any possible grant of rights in content, result from each such third parties' terms and conditions or, in the absence of those, applicable statutory law.
terms_of_service.acceptable_use: This Application and the Service may only be used within the scope of what they are provided for, under these Terms and applicable law.
terms_of_service.acceptable_use_responsibility: Users are solely responsible for making sure that their use of this Application and/or the Service violates no applicable law, regulations or third-party rights.
terms_of_service.acceptable_use_rights: Therefore, the Owner reserves the right to take any appropriate measure to protect its legitimate interests including by denying Users access to this Application or the Service, terminating contracts, reporting any misconduct performed through this Application or the Service to the competent authorities – such as judicial or administrative authorities - whenever Users engage or are suspected to engage in any of the following activities:
acceptable_use_list: violate laws, regulations and/or these Terms;
considerably impair the Owner's legitimate interests;
offend the Owner or any third party.
terms_of_service.privacy_policy: To learn more about the use of their Personal Data, Users may refer to the privacy policy of this Application.
terms_of_service.ip_rights: Without prejudice to any more specific provision of these Terms, any intellectual property rights, such as copyrights, trademark rights, patent rights and design rights related to this Application are the exclusive property of the Owner or its licensors and are subject to the protection granted by applicable laws or international treaties relating to intellectual property.
terms_of_service.ip_rights_trademarks: All trademarks — nominal or figurative — and all other marks, trade names, service marks, word marks, illustrations, images, or logos appearing in connection with this Application are, and remain, the exclusive property of the Owner or its licensors and are subject to the protection granted by applicable laws or international treaties related to intellectual property.
terms_of_service.changes: The Owner reserves the right to amend or otherwise modify these Terms at any time. In such cases, the Owner will appropriately inform the User of these changes.
terms_of_service.changes_effect: Such changes will only affect the relationship with the User for the future.
terms_of_service.changes_acceptance: The continued use of the Service will signify the Users acceptance of the revised Terms. If Users do not wish to be bound by the changes, they must stop using the Service. Failure to accept the revised Terms, may entitle either party to terminate the Agreement.
terms_of_service.changes_previous: The applicable previous version will govern the relationship prior to the User's acceptance. The User can obtain any previous version from the Owner.
terms_of_service.changes_law: If required by applicable law, the Owner will specify the date by which the modified Terms will enter into force.
terms_of_service.assignment: The Owner reserves the right to transfer, assign, dispose of by novation, or subcontract any or all rights or obligations under these Terms, taking the User's legitimate interests into account. Provisions regarding changes of these Terms will apply accordingly.
terms_of_service.assignment_user: Users may not assign or transfer their rights or obligations under these Terms in any way, without the written permission of the Owner.
terms_of_service.contacts: All communications relating to the use of this Application must be sent using the contact information stated in this document.
terms_of_service.severability: Should any provision of these Terms be deemed or become invalid or unenforceable under applicable law, the invalidity or unenforceability of such provision shall not affect the validity of the remaining provisions, which shall remain in full force and effect.
terms_of_service.governing_law: These Terms are governed by the law of the place where the Owner is based, as disclosed in the relevant section of this document, without regard to conflict of laws principles.
terms_of_service.venue: The exclusive competence to decide on any controversy resulting from or connected to these Terms lies with the courts of the place where the Owner is based, as displayed in the relevant section of this document.
terms_of_service.amicable: Users may bring any disputes to the Owner who will try to resolve them amicably.
terms_of_service.amicable_right: While Users' right to take legal action shall always remain unaffected, in the event of any controversy regarding the use of this Application or the Service, Users are kindly asked to contact the Owner at the contact details provided in this document.
terms_of_service.amicable_complaint: The User may submit the complaint including a brief description and if applicable, the details of the related order, purchase, or account, to the Owner's email address specified in this document.
terms_of_service.amicable_process: The Owner will process the complaint without undue delay and within 21 days of receiving it.
